item.title: Torva full helm invisible?
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

Hello there, i am trying to make two torva full helms… one with better stats than the other.

Now what i did was copy this:

case 13362: itemDef.modelid = 62714; itemDef.name = "Torva full helm"; itemDef.description = "Torva full helm."; itemDef.modelZoom = 672; itemDef.modelRotationY = 85; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1867; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.anInt165 = 62738; itemDef.anInt200 = 62754; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; break;

And only changed the case (the number of the item)
So it worked perfectly, the bonuses works the torva full helm in the invertory works

but, if i wear the full helm it goes invisible while its actually the same custom/model but with a different name…

Thanks for reading this, hope you know whats wrong. leave a reply if you do

EDIT: The old one still works, but the new does not.

Read full topic
